detectors.description:
AVOUSDTPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AVOUSDTPool.sol#698-725) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(periodFinish.sub(block.timestamp)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AVOUSDTPool.sol#707)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AVOUSDTPool.sol#710)
